headline: Is It Too Late to Consider Dollar General After Its 79% Rally in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Dollar General is still a bargain after its rebound, or if you have already missed the sweet spot? You are not alone; this stock has quietly become one of the more debated value ideas in retail. After a rough few years, the share price has snapped back sharply, up 33.2% over the last month and 79.1% year to date, even though it is still well below levels from three and five years ago. Much of this move has been driven by improving sentiment around discount retail as shoppers...
